page.title: 04Education - schools
page.content: Amongst the schools in the area there is Gleadless Valley comprehensive.This school takes most of its pupils from the local council house estate.In 1985 there were 46 teachers to cater for 760 pupils.As we write the school life is being disrupted by teachers withdrawing their goodwill this means not doing tasks they aren't being paid for,e.g.running school teams and clubs,and developing the school curriculum in their own time. Normally a pupil would find a typical day as follows:registration at 9 a.m. followed by lessons till noon,with a short break in between.In the afternoon we work from 1 p.m. until 3.30 p.m. During lunchtimes and after school some pupils would attend a disco,play football, basketball, rehearse drama,stay in detention,go to the computer club...
